Power driver seat with 4-way lumbar support

Dual power side mirrors with turn signal indicators
Hands-free Smart Liftgate with auto open
Proximity key entry with push button start
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Leather seating surfaces and heated front seats

Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with color LCD Multi-Info Display

packages.title: Tech Package for Sport
details: 8-inch touchscreen navigation system with Android Auto
Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver seat and side mirrors

packages.title: Tech Package for Sport 2.0T Ultimate
details: Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) with Pedestrian Detection
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) with Automatic Vehicle Hold
